spell_list.description: Whenever the bruiser attacks, they will have a chance to build an increment of Martial Retaliation, which increases their riposte chance and maximum health. Taking damage has a chance to remove an increment. This spell increments up to 10 times.
spell_list.description_pvp: Whenever the bruiser attacks, they will have a chance to build an increment of Martial Retaliation, which increases their riposte chance and maximum health. Taking damage has a chance to remove an increment. This spell increments up to 10 times.

effect_list.description: On any combat or spell hit this spell may cast Martial Retaliation on target.  Lasts for 30.0 seconds.  Triggers about 15.0 times per minute.
The effects are multiplied by the increment count. Taking damage has a 50% chance to remove an increment.
Caster will Riposte 0.5% of incoming frontal attacks.  Attacks from other quadrants have the same chance of being Parried
Gives caster an extra 1.0% mitigation to their worn armor
Cannot be modified except by direct means

spell_list.name: Martial Retaliation
